name: Monkey Challenge
description:
The special kind of triathlon will take place in Ginzling on the 1st June weekend (2nd / 3rd June 2017). This triathlon - the MONKEY CHALLENGE - consists of the sports of climbing, running and paragliding.

The MONKEY CHALLENGE is organized as part of the annual AUSTRIA CLIMBING FESTIVAL. This festival is organized by the Stonemonkeys Chillertal, a sports climbing association, in cooperation with the Bergrettung Ginzling. We will start at 2.00 p.m. on June 2nd. A prize money of 3600,- euros will be distributed. The entry fee per team is 90,- Euros.

Acts:
Klaubauf
Cotton Underwear
Cherry Bomb
Ciela


And all this at FREE entry and FREE SHUTTLESERVICE.
The Stonemonkeys Chillertal and the Bergrettung Ginzling look forward to numerous spectators and participants.
Registration for MONKEY CHALLENGE at http://www.climbingfestival.at/monkey-challenge/
